content: Investments Stocks Securities Equities Asked by Jacky YapAsked on 15 May 2019Which app / software do you use to set price alerts for tracking both SGX and US equities? For example - send me a reminder when stock A reaches price X? I've tried Call Levels but there are difficulty signing up.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 15 May 2019Use a brokerage platform with access to US and SGX markets.Most digital brokerage platforms will have a trade alert or price alert system. I am using POEMS for SGX and they have an alert system, will send sms, email to me once my alert price is reached.0 comments0
